name: Odysseus: Long Way Home
description: Embark on an exciting journey and plunge yourself into the myths of Ancient Greece with Odysseus, the legendary hero of the Trojan war.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: 1000 Mhz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 128 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 450 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is not the best hidden-object game, but it's quite nice.  It's locked in a low resolution, there is no voice acting, and the script is quite awkward (at least in English). But otherwise the graphics are very good, the hidden-object scenes are fair, and even the puzzles are well-balanced.  A pleasant way to spend 3-4 hours.
Fun point and click. You relive the jurney back home of Odysseus. Love it!
Hideously optimized for Mac. A hidden object game should not be running at 5FPS.
